Hero.name: Milton
Hero.desc: A master of the incendiary arts, Milton's talents are oft overlooked due to his poor communication skills and affinity for staplers of the red Swingline variety.

Hero.name: Stu Steiner
Hero.desc: Legend has it that he once deadlocked Chuck Norris with a single thread. All we know is that he's somewhere in the building. Because we hear him.

Hero.name: Carty
Hero.desc: All you need is love. That, and a big shield. Who ever said gnomes are only for gardens? This one just shattered your femur.

Hero.name: Alice
Hero.desc: Don't let her sweet demeanor and adorable mews fool you - there's not a cat fiercer. With claws honed into needles, not much can stand up to her... and live.

Hero.name: Dwight
Hero.desc: A descendent of a long line of fighters, you could not find his equal in ferocity. He also boasts a purple belt in karate.

Hero.name: Leslie
Hero.desc: Although naive at times, Leslie is intellegent, well read, and will destroy her enemies with her enthusiasm.

Hero.name: Walter
Hero.desc: Don't step over the line against bowling's greatest 'Nam veteran -- he may be the only one around who cares about the rules. Nihilists beware.
